nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 20 is the twentieth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. The issue is comprised of the stories "Hide and Seek," by Cavan Scott, and "Tales from Wild Space: The Journey," by George Mann. Star Wars Adventures 20 was published on April 17, 2019 by IDW Publishing.
During the Clone Wars, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Jedi Master Yoda undertake an urgent mission, where Anakin's rebellious nature could spell trouble for the Republic.
